file_content.text: I am busy. Science must be attended to.
Doctor Terrab? I've come about Nem'ro's bounty on the advanced droid datacores.
Ah, an unwelcome diversion from my work. I'm trying to discover what allows these Evocii to survive despite the horrendous pollution.
They don't exactly thrive but they are still here, all these years later. I hypothesize that--but you don't care, do you?
Very well, here are your credits. I'll examine the datacore for Nem'ro then return to the important work I'm doing.
